original_title: Darkwing Duck - Darkly Dawns the Duck
overview: The legendary masked avenger, Darkwing Duck battles the notorious Taurus Bulba, the bullish kingpin who steals the government's top secret weapon -- the Ram Rod -- and kidnaps the mischievous Gosalyn, the only one who knows the arming code.
title: Darkwing Duck - Darkly Dawns the Duck
